title: Athletics pitcher Drew Pomeranz has shoulder surgery
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Oakland Athletics left-hander Drew Pomeranz has undergone surgery on his pitching shoulder. … Click to Continue »...
